page.title: 07TONBRIDGE THEATRE & ARTS:2
page.content: The Oast Theatre has many backstage facilities including a very large wardrobe in a converted barn;it com_ prises 3 storeys and has approx. 10,000 costumes.This is run by a few devotees who have collected these over the past years.The costumes are hired out to the public as well as being used for performances.The revenue from this enterprise is a great help to the Theatre,earning up to Â£10,000 per ann- um.The Oast has extensive sound and lighting complexes that are contin- ually being upgraded as well as 2 mob- ile units for competition use.The Oast is a member of the Little Theatre Guild which is a nationwide amateur theatre organisation.The Guild arr- anges meetings and shows at different theatres.At the conferences ideas and suggestions are exchanged.
